## FFTWaveGenerator.setWaveStrength() method

Sets the wave strength for the specified cascade

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveStrength(cascade: number, strength: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cascade | number | The cascade index |
|  strength | number | The new wave strength for the specified cascade |

**Returns:**

void
